Package uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.app

Provides the classes necessary to create an applet and the classes an applet uses to navigate the GUI.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminHomeController
    This class provides the methods and elements of the GUI so that the user can act upon the elements defined in the FXML file for the Admin Home screen (AdminHome.fxml).
    EmployeeHomeController
    The EmployeeHomeController class provides the methods and elements of the GUI so that the user can act upon the elements defined in the FXML file for the Employee Home screen (EmployeeHome.fxml).
    Launcher
    The Laucher class launches the application showing and displays the log in screen.
    LoginController
    The LoginController class provides the methods and elements of the GUI so that the user can act upon the elements defined in the FXML file for the login screen (Login.fxml).
    MenuController
    The MenuController class provides the methods and elements of the GUI so that the user can act upon the elements defined in the FXML file for the edit menu screen (Menu.fxml).
    OrderHistoryController
    The OrderHistoryController class provides the methods and elements of the GUI so that the user can act upon the elements defined in the FXML file for the orders history screen (OrdersHistory.fxml).
    OrdersController
    The OrdersController class provides the methods and elements of the GUI so that the user can act upon the elements defined in the FXML file for the orders screen (Orders.fxml).
    OrderSearchController
    The OrderSearchController class provides the methods and elements of the GUI so that the user can act upon the elements defined in the FXML file for the order search screen (OrderSearch.fxml).
    StaffController
    The StaffController class provides the methods and elements of the GUI so that the user can act upon the elements defined in the FXML file for the Staff screen (OrderSearch.fxml).
    TablesController
    The TablesController class provides the methods and elements of the GUI so that the user can act upon the elements defined in the FXML file for the Tables screen (OrderSearch.fxml).

Package uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.app Description

Provides the classes necessary to create an applet and the classes an applet uses to navigate the GUI. Contains all the GUI controllers.

Author:
Miguel Marin Vermelho
